document.full_text: even with a loaded pitching staff, the phillies and their fans had to know there would be games like tuesday's, a 7-1 loss to the mets. right?
document.title: sports of the times: great pitching, greater expectations for phillies
lines_and_colors: even with a loaded pitching staff, the phillies and their fans had to know there would be games like tuesday's, a 7-1 loss to the mets. right?
